title: Understanding Worksheet Orientation
text: When printing a worksheet, the orientation determines how the content is laid out on the page. There are two main types of orientations to consider.

title: Types of Orientation
text: The two primary orientations are:\n$$1$$. Portrait Orientation: The page is taller than it is wide.\n$$2$$. Landscape Orientation: The page is wider than it is tall.

title: Identify the Correct Orientation
text: Which orientation results in a page that is wider than it is tall?
